title: about remake
body: i got some idea or i think everyone might think so , my few idea is about remake lol... why remake can be like the first 5 min and 20 min and 30 min so in those time if ur teammate afk so we can have a remake no matter how late the game because when u playing rank and someone afk in the middle game, is that fair ?so i think that maybe will better for a fair and fun game lol

replies.body: How about if someone afks, the rest of the team gets the lp they were going to get (assuming they win ofc).   At least some form of recognition you went on to win regardless of only having 4 players.

Short answer, it's too easily abusable.

You could play with a friend on a second account, and as soon as it looks like you're losing, they can afk and you can remake. Essentially if you had someone (or had paid someone) to put in the time with you, you would never lose a game.
